DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Bioavailability Study 3 Test Tablet Formulations Bazedoxifene Compared With A Reference Tablet Formulation Bazedoxifene/Conjugated Estrogens Healthy Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy postmenopausal woman Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.0 35.0 kg/m2 body weight > = 50 kg Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential
